attributes.action: repeal section 1 of the dangerous dogs act 1991, to make owners responsible for their dogs behavior, to never pass regulations or laws which are breed or type spefic, to make harshier punshiments for those who fight dogs.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
bsl is unfair and will never protect the public or the dogs.

both dog attacks and dog fighting have increased despite the pit bull ban. if it hasn't worked in 18 years, it is never going to work.

we need a new law.
